content.detailedDescription:
My wife was returning from her office in her office cab, it was about 10:20 pm ist. she started calling me multiple times on my cell phone, when i picked up the call, she hastily said "go to the roof... go to the roof... now!!". i asked her why, to which she said there is a bloody ufo in the back side of our house.
i quickly grabbed the rooftop keys and ran the stairs like i never run before and opened the door. i went to the roof and started staring in the sky, but couldn't see anything. just the normal sky and the stars. i called her back and she said "it's gone"! dammit you missed it.
so, that's that, i just missed that ufo (which i will always regret, it was a once in a life time opportunity). by what she told me, it was a like a big ball of fire, a round glowing object in the night sky drifting away. and in the end it just blinked and vanished.
she and her colleague in the cab did make a video, one from an iphone 4s and one from a samsung phone. i don't know if you can zoom into these videos and see the actual shape of the objects. but i am uploading them here anyways. you can do your r&d on it and please let me know if you have found anything about it.
i will be anxiously waiting.
content.summary: It was a big round ball glowing with fire like flames.

content.detailedDescription:
I was chilling on my balcony and saw a black object flying under the clouds in a not so straight line to south-west. it was a relatively small unknown formed solid black dot-like object moving too fast, steadily and solid for an eagle. it was too small and unspecificly formed for a plane. until it disappeared i sometimes had to search for it and then it appeared quickly again in the same flightline. so it was´nt visible for 1/15th of the time. it had no tails, noise, emitting lights etc..

my phone was broken at the time but i guess you would´nt see that small object to a satisfying degree anyway.
content.summary: Black object flew like a drunken sporting aircraft and disappeared a few times

content.detailedDescription:
It was 3:50am as i was driving home from work. i happened to catch this incredibly bright light fly over my car, like an orb. at first i thought it was a shooting star, but it didn't leave a trail, it was like looking at something in 60fps at a super high shutter speed, except it was just an orb that seemed completely surreal. after a second of viewing this object, still moving at a fast speed it blinked once, continued to illuminate and then vanished. the way the object vanished was sudden and seemed to have vanished out of thin air. the object was headed north-east towards the mountains. after seeing this (my first sighting) i felt excited. 
the day after, and for an entire week, i began noticing a random spike in military air traffic. within that week i had witnessed: 3 chinook helicopters, 3 tiltroter helicopters, 4 black (normal military?) helicopters, and a bunch of ac130 looking planes. the planes had usaf under one wing and on the side the only noticeable marking was a vertical orange streak. the planes themselves were a steely grey. i saw 3 of those within 10 minutes take off somewhere north of where i was currently, flying south and turning to fly north-east. i should mention, the chinooks and tiltroters were also coming to and from the north-east. 
its been a few weeks and the military air traffic is non-existent now.
content.summary: Shooting star-like, blinked once and vanished

content.detailedDescription: Bright white light comparable in size to a planet in the west at appx. 20 degrees elevation. after i pointed it out to my husband, he pulls out his phone to pull up a star app. i close one eye and find 3 fixed objects on the skyline, and it seems like it isn't moving. maybe some twinkle, but i was looking at it through the light pollution dome. my husband says something about having trouble getting a fix so i look over at his phone and set the poles and when i looked back it was gone.
content.summary: Large star-like object about the size of a planet

content.detailedDescription: Went to pittsburgh today to see the navy ship. while we was there my girlfriend wanted pictures of her car on top of the parking garage in station square. after taking the pictures and reviewing them. i notice lights in the sky. at first i thought it was a reflection messing with the camera from the sky scraper behind it. after zooming in i notice there is a dark spot in the center of the lights in one of the pictures. i sent the pictures to my phone and the light look like tetris game. i can upload original pictures or email them if anyone is interested in viewing them. i have no idea what this is or can be. it is possible that the reflection of that building caused it but i can explain the dark spot in the center that i seen.
content.summary: Was in pittsburgh today taking picture of car from top of parking garage and notice lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Went to pittsburgh today to see the navy ship. while we was there my girlfriend wanted pictures of her car on top of the parking garage in station square. after taking the pictures and reviewing them. i notice lights in the sky. at first i thought it was a reflection messing with the camera from the sky scraper behind it. after zooming in i notice there is a dark spot in the center of the lights in one of the pictures. i sent the pictures to my phone and the light look like tetris game. i can upload original pictures or email them if anyone is interested in viewing them. i have no idea what this is or can be. it is possible that the reflection of that building caused it but i can explain the dark spot in the center that i seen.
content.summary: Was in pittsburgh today taking picture of car from top of parking garage and notice lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i had just eaten at roy rogers and decided to go to 7-eleven to withdraw some cash. when we left the store and started back to my car, we decided to walk along the strip mall. about half the way down the strip mall, i noticed an object in the sky. i have had experiences in childhood and otherwise possibly, but i remain a true skeptic. you will hear my girlfriend in the background of the video saying something about it not being a balloon.   that being said, when i spotted it, it was moving laterally at what looked like a perfectly straight heading, eastward. being the skeptic that i am i didn't start filming immediately because i didn't want to come across as an idiot.  it moved slowly, highly reflective and looked to either be changing physically or rotating. after about two(?) minutes, it had crossed from northwest to northeast, still moving laterally. i decided to swallow my pride and pulled out my iphone and hit record. of course i had focus issue among other things but i realized its speed has also increased and it had begun a steep vertical ascent. i have the video of it and will link you to it. thanks for taking my report. 

ps it was coming, kinda-sorta from the direction of manassas municipal airport. they may have some information.

i have the file uploaded the youtube, however if i upload it here i fear it may be very low quality. if so, email me and i'll link you to youtube which is in hd. 

thanks again,
patrick larson
content.summary: A highly reflective object in the sky, seen by multiple witnesses

content.detailedDescription: Two friends and myself were on our way to school in our junior year in the fall of 1973.  instead of riding the bus that day,  my friend's father agreed to drive us to school.  we attended a vocational school 30 minutes north of where we lived. it was a clear sunny morning and we were taking the usual route to shelby, ohio. as we drove through the countryside we spotted a bright light hovering over a body of water.  it was very odd to see a  large ball of light hovering over water and we wondered what it could be. then the light split into three parts, two flew off in other directions, and the remaining light began to follow our vehicle, but at a parallel distance. this really freaked out three teenaged girls  and my friend's father was getting irritated at our screaming and getting upset.  he was driving and could not see what we could see from his vantage point. the longer it followed us, the more upset we became, especially when it turned when our truck turned. it followed us all the way to school and by the time we got there we had made several 90 degree turns and it made every turn with us, and by the time we got to school it was no longer a bright light but a silver cigar-shaped tube like object flying nearly overhead and not making a sound.  at that time my friend's father did see it and wondered what it could be but thought we were silly and overreacting.  we were in tears by then and could not wait to get out of the truck and into the school building.  the object continued on in a straight line after we got out of the truck.  we were so upset when we got into the school, the kids asked us what was wrong and we made the big mistake of telling them what we saw. they made fun of us for a week or more and called us "space girls" and we were the joke of the school.  i stopped telling people about it so they wouldn't make fun of me anymore and think i was crazy, but i will never forget what i saw and i know it happened. to this day it bothers me to see a light divide into several lights (as in a movie) and turns my stomach a bit. i now think the object followed us out of curiosity, as we were riding in a powder blue 1 ton crew cab long bed pickup truck, and we stuck out like a sore thumb.
content.summary: This is in connection with the oct 1973 sighting near mansfield, ohio. just saw a request for witnesses to this craft in the mansfield news journal 9/7/2015.

content.detailedDescription:
my granddaughter was the first to see the vessels from the window in our
kitchen. she alerted us to the objects. my daughter and i were the next ones to observe the objects.At first i didn't realize what it might be. couldn't tell how far away they were from our house. the rear lights were oblong with three lights in that shape.
each object would change positions. one would go to the bottom of the other and vice versa. we heard our dogs barking at something in a tree in our backyard. we don't usually have any animals up in that tree except maybe for squirrels. the dogs were clearly upset and i couldn't see what was up there but it sounded something like raccoons or some animal similar to them.
and like i said it was unusual for us to see or hear any animal in that tree. i didn't see the objects from outside.It was probably behind a tree line. about 15 to 20 minutes later we didn't see anything else. i called the dogs in because they were loud and i didn't want them annoying the neighbors. i have never experienced anything like this before. i didn't think that my family and i would. it was something that you hear that happens to other people not you.
content.summary: Seen through kitchen windows. rear lights observed. two vehicles moved around each other. beings in tree. dogs attracted.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside on our deck watching boats and various fireworks on webster lake at around 10pm.  two very bright white strobe lights, due north of my location & about 25 to 30 feet apart, flashed alternately twice.  then a second later they flashed again but were moving towards the east at a high rate of speed.  they diapered behind the trees and out of sight.  my first thought was it was a boat with led lighting or some type of firework on the opposite shore.

what changed my mind was that the next day i was talking to out neighbor and he mentioned seeing the lights too.  i didn't bring it up because i had dismissed it. but, he saw the lights from his boat from i different perspective as me.  and, his description of the lights was identical to what i saw.  this eliminated my theory of fireworks or a boat.  there were at least two other people on his boat that saw the lights too.

these lights were about 10' above the water.  they were stationary then moved fast towards the ne and disappeared.  i know that others had to have seen them as there were a few boats out on the lake in the general vicinity.  this sighting happened very quickly which makes it difficult to determine much about what it was.  i am open to any suggestions but i have never seen anything like this on the lake in ten years.

my neighbor also said he saw a object, maybe a "drone", moving over the front yard of his house when he returned home after his boat ride.  his description was of a low flying slow moving object with a solid whitish light underneath it.  he said it looked like and old fashioned light bulb with an orange tint to it.  i am not sure why someone would be flying an expensive drone at night over a lake.  one slip up and it's gone for good.  maybe it is related to the sighting, maybe not.

note:  boats are not supposed to go faster than 25mph at night.  if this was a boat he was going more like 100mph without making any noise.  and, hovering 10 feet over the water.
content.summary: Stationary flashing strobe lights then they move quickly to the right a flashed again.

content.detailedDescription: I was facing north in my yard watching a large bird flying overhead. then a round white light caught my attention. at first i thought it was a jetliner but it didn't have the same reflection. the light seemed to be coming from the object itself. it was coming from nnw directly overhead. it passed over and i lost sight momentarily as it went by the sun. a second or two later i picked it up again and shortly it made a course correction. it turned tighter than a jetliner but not a 90 deg. turn. new course was wsw and i lost sight as it flew into haze and light clouds.
content.summary: high alt traveling nnw to sse after short time course change wsw

content.detailedDescription:
I was backpacking by myself in annadel state park. an unpredicted storm blew in. i went to sleep in my tent and was awakened 3 hours later by loud wind and rain. i couldn't sleep so i got dressed,put a rain poncho on and went out walking about midnight.I stopped at a spot where i had a good view of a large meadow.I stood there looking for a few minutes when i saw 3 lights at the other end of the meadow about 300 yards away moving along the edge of the meadow.I thought they were car headlights at first, but as i kept looking there were no cars. when they got about 100 yards away, they turned and came straight towards me moving extremely fast so i ran away from them as fast as i could. within a few seconds the first one passed over me engulfing me in blue and orange sparks and causing all the hair on my body to stand  up. i was so freaked out that i ran all the way out of the park (about 2 miles), and back to my house ,about 5 more miles . i would describe the objects as being 8ft diameter rolling spheres of light filled with blue and orange sparks. seeing these things would have been strange enough,but the fact that they changed direction and one hit me,was and still is traumatizing. i have told many people this story as it is the strangest thing that has ever happened to me. i am very curious if there are others who have experienced similar things and possibly been hit also.   

    thanks for reading tim
content.summary: I saw 3 lights moving on path then they changed direction and came toward me . i ran away and the first one hit me and passed over me.

content.detailedDescription:
We live slightly up in the hills of ashland about 5-10 minutes out of downtown, surrounded by trees. both of my sons (ages 9 and 7) were outside camping in a tent they had setup on our deck facing east toward grizzly peak. this was the third night they had slept out there alone in a row. around 11:30pm they came running into the house petrified. i was dozing off lightly on the couch on the north side of the house. same level. my older son leads the way, his face is white and jaw is dropped. he's stuttering for words telling me that a big disc flew down over their tent and around our house. i asked them to elaborate, and they both started telling me the story in tandem and in agreement, practically word for word:

my older son was playing on a device when he saw a very bright pulsating light through the top of the tent near a small opening. he saw it but didn't care. he said moments later the light became so bright that he had to investigate. when he got out of the tent and looked up he said directly over their tent was a very bright light pulsation from a craft. the light was alone and pulsating from an eye shaped hole. he stared at it confused and thought for a split moment that it was a helicopter or an air plane. he said it then started showing different lights all around its body, and he saw that it was a disc shape, and that it was much closer than he thought, just near the tree line. he screamed for his brother to come see and shouted that it was a ufo. my younger son now begins telling the story: he said to my older son 'yea right --- your lying shut up', my older son insisted and stuck his head in the tent and yelled at him to come up. the younger boy comes out of the tent and said that he saw the large disc shape object moving slowly now over their heads and down to the house, blinking multitudes of lights. both boys are simultaneously speaking and using hang gestures to show me how the lights were moving around the spherical center of this disc. "so many" lights trailing everywhere. multiple colors, blue red and yellow. then, perfectly timed they both say "then boom! one huge light came from the center! shining all over us!." so bright it lit up the trees.

they described the object as having a round dome on the top and bottom that the lights ran down. the the dome being bigger on top, with a bright light going around it horizontally. i was stunned at their reactions! this is extremely odd, especially for my older son who does not believe in anything other-worldly, and my younger son who seldom tells a lie. and never tells a lie without obviously displaying it with his body language. i asked them what the object looked like. they said it was "amazing", "beautiful", "like something they had never seen before ever". my son described it as metallic and struggled to find words through his emotion. i ask him how big it was, and they both agreed it was at least the size of a bus, if not 2 busses. i asked them if they thought maybe it was a drone or quadcopter? my older son said it could have been but that it was huge. i suggested that if it were a drone and were large that it would be very loud. he immediately realized and told me that this object was completely silent but may have had a faint humming sound which came from it (my younger son did not comment on this, and only agreed that it was extremely quiet).

i began recording them immediately on my phone without them knowing so that i could replay it later. as they are telling me, my younger son sprinted back through the hallway to my baby daughter’s room (3 years old). also on the north side of the house. when i yelled for him not to wake her up, he came back out and said he wanted to make sure she was still there in her bed because it had flown that way. which i found heartwarming. i continued to ask them what it did and why was it here they thought? my older son said he didn't know, but that it was "pacifically, pacifically at our house and interested in us" ('specifically' he meant). they described again how this object became very active and moved down more into their field of view as if for them to watch. there is a clearing on the south side of the house that has no trees. where they described seeing this object was not at all hindered by trees. it would have been completely clear of obstructions with the nights sky behind it. using a lot of hand gestures they told me the disc started circling downward slowly on the south side of our house into the trees (the deck is on the east/south corner of the house). i asked them how low it was they thought and they adamantly said they could have thrown a rock at it and that it was very low. they then said in the same corkscrew fashion it went back up and directly over the top of our house, still displaying the multitudes of lights and colors. they said it went across our house slowly and headed towards our neighbors house (northward toward the side of the house i was sleeping on).

they said it then rose above the tree line and started flying away. they knew i was on that side of the house and ran in to come tell me. at my feet there are very large windows and my younger son insisted that i must have saw it. when i said i hadn't seen it they were shocked and disappointed. i asked them how long the ordeal took and my older son said at least 3 minutes. i asked them again if they thought it may have been a plane or some other sort of craft, and they both said it looked like something they had never seen ever, and my younger son insisted that he thought they were aliens and that he was worried. my older son agreed and said he could not imagine it being from this planet, but that he was not scared just shaken. he told me how shocked he was that he would ever get the chance to see something like this in his life. something that would make him change his mind about ufos and aliens existing.

i told them that i believed them, and that i believe it to be likely that there are other beings in and around this planet and that perhaps these beings seized an opportunity to touch the minds of 2 young boys. they were very relieved that i believed them and insisted i message and tell their mom. they also asked to sleep with me because they were too scared to go into their rooms. this is also very odd behavior for them. as was it for them to both agree on every aspect, and be so worked up.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 boys, 9 and 7 camping in tent on the deck interact with a metallic disc

content.detailedDescription:
In 1973 october i was 13 years old and working in my back yard with my big sister helping me when i noticed what looked like a large craft in the sky above us and even at 13 years old i could tell that looked like a ufo. i yelled to my sister and told her to look and she was amazed at what she was looking at then we seen a army hilicopter fly right underneith it and green lights from the craft lit up the helicopter below it and both machines set there and hovered, they were not moving in any direction, at that point my sister tells me to be quiet about this and say nothing to nobody, her telling me that this is probably the military due to the army helicopter and close to airpot.

well here it is 40 years later i hear someone at my local ymca talking about seeing a ufo and helicopter in 1973 thats when i realized we saw the same thing and know is known as the coyn incident, all these years i thought me and my sister were the only ones to see this..I have never forgotten it and it has always been in the back of mind and now after re-searching it many people saw it.

local newspaper article just came out in mansfield, ohio and asking if anyone remembers this incedent to please file a report here so that is why im here, thank you very much.

p.S. i know what i saw was very un-normal
content.summary: Witness to the coyn incident in mansfield, oio seen craft light the up helicopter under it

content.detailedDescription: My son captured a few minutes of video on his cell phone of a string of flashing red lights that seemed to rise up from the direction of the richmond/martinez refinery docks along san pablo bay, then to pass over the carquinez bridge and then to proceed east along the carquinez strait. this video doesn't capture what we saw with our naked eyes, which is that these lights were bright red, glowing bright like road flares so they created an orb effect, though they appeared to be flashing "electronically". most notably, they appeared to be vertical "sticks" that moved through the air steadily, as opposed to the way balloons act when they are blown along by variable breezes. in fact, last night was far more still than most nights around here, when we typically get strong easterly winds. somehow the stick shapes remained perfectly vertical as they moved along, staying low over the strait at first before gaining elevation and going out of sight over benicia. there was no apparent reason for why they remained in the air; no balloons holding them aloft that one could see, or no airplane dragging them along behind. (it would have been too long of a trailing tail for such a thing to be done anyway.) the event lasted for a few minutes as more and more of them just kept coming up over the bridge. my wife saw them and thought we were being invaded. there was no sound as 20, possibly more, of these glowing orbs appeared, moving along the strait, rising in the sky and disappearing (blinking out?) more or less over benicia. the sight brought neighbors out of their houses to watch them. when i first saw the lights coming our way i thought that they may have been helicopters, until i saw their shapes. they seemed to move as if under control, looking a lot like those red orbs in close encounters of the third kind, but they were clearly vertical stick shapes with pulsating lights top and bottom. my second thought was that they may have been some form of those flying lanterns the asian community loves so, but these were clearly not flames we were seeing, but more like electronic flashing lights. a helicopter appeared in the area shortly after the event passed, and it circled for a time as if surveilling the area in which we had just seen these weird glowing lights. it was too dark by then to see what type of helicopter it was, but it looked big and it was loud, like the kind we have coming out of nearby travis air force base. you must look pretty hard to see the cluster of lights in the sky in this video, which is a snippet of a video that lasted for a couple minutes. you might be able to pick out the stick shape of some of the closer lights. it is the second instance of unidentified flying objects that we have seen in this area in the past six weeks. the earlier one was in bright daylight and looked like a very large but shallow rectangular shape that moved over vallejo then took a sharp left, turned sideways so that it became tall and narrow, and quickly moved in the direction of the coast. we have seen neither event noted in the local news and have no idea what it was that we saw - true unidentified flying objects. a few years back we saw four red lights moving over the valero refinery north of benicia, before the configuration changed shapes to a triangular form and slowly moved away from us. just sharing because it is all so weird and i can't imagine what any of it has been.
content.summary: Twenty-plus red flashing orbs rose up from san pablo bay area, crossed over carquinez bridge and headed up carquinez strait before gaining elevation and disappearing over benicia. they were vertical stick shapes with bright flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: I've been a "ufo" photographer for just over 15 months. the reason i use quotation marks to frame the term ufo is because of its common use in our vernacular, particularly in regards to just about all forms of unknown or unidentified aerial phenomena. ufo is usually the first word that comes to mind whenever we want to describe something strange we've seen in the sky. with over a year of observing and photographing a steady parade of what appears to be otherworldly visitors, i've become convinced that most of what i've been witnessing are of inter-dimensional origins. if that is the case, then a more accurate term to describe what i've been observing would be idms, as in inter-dimensionals. their manifestations are usually static in form, and are almost always cloudlike in their appearance. like a cloud, their unique appearance can slowly morph as they drift along in the sky. yet unlike a cloud, their bizarre features are well beyond what you might expect to have been shaped by natural earthly forces. i don't bother taking photos of the sky unless i see something that appears to be totally alien in its appearance. by the way, for you old school purists that just can't let go of the "flying metallic disc" standard of ufos, i still get photos of them fairly often. the ones i've captured are not necessarily metallic in their appearance (most often they are black), but they do appear to be what i'd call hard crafts in comparison to the more wispy looking idms. as is most often the case, these hard crafts are small utility vehicles that i don't even see when taking my photos. they just show up while my attention is focused on the idms in the background, sort of like what is popularly called photobombing. for now, i'm hoping you'll find "the hand of god" images satisfactory for the time being.
content.summary: The hand of god

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my river cab with passengers from bethel to napakiak. another river cab was driving behind me also with passengers. when within about 3 miles from the village of napakiak is when i first noticed the three lights just above the ground at the south end of the village, when within about one mile from the village i stopped and approached the other cab behind me to ask him if he sees what i see, he said yes and he also said that he would go and see what they were after he drops his passengers off. i dropped my passengers off then went home, (did not check any further). the next day an elder who house was closest to the lights told a story of seeing the lights and also mentioning that it looked like there was stairs or steps coming down to the ground from one of the lights or balls.
content.summary: Three large orange lights side by side, then one on right merged with one in the middle and became two.

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend hanging out in a parking lot in st johns. we were watching chemtrail drone planes flying, leaving trails in the sky. then there was a near-mid-air collision between two chemtrail drones. as we watched in awe, i was compelled to keep looking up. all of a sudden, a silver/black object appeared out of nowhere, right in the spot of the near collision. it was sort of pear shaped and appeared to be reflecting the sunlight off of it's metallic surface. it appeared to be spinning around, constantly dazzling & reflecting the sunlight. it hovered just below the cloud line. when we first noticed it, i grabbed the attention of my friend to make sure he was seeing it. at first, he thought it was a drone, but then immediately i said no, that drones don't sparkle during the daytime & they certainly don't spin around. i was in total awe & amazement, as i've only ever seen ufo's and orbs at night. the object first hovered in one place, then started to drift to the left, towards the ne direction. it appeared to be hovering right over the columbia river, between portland and vancouver and it's possible the people in vancouver could have seen it. my friend grabbed his phone to record it and his phone immediately 'died' and rebooted. i kept watching it. it continued about 100 feet north and then stopped again and just continued to hover and spin around. at this point, i grabbed my ipad and opened it up, clicked on the camera app, and started taking photos very rapidly. i took a bunch in a row, because the object appeared to be fading in and out of 3rd dimensional reality, as it spun, it would disappear and then appear again, making it appear super sparkly! this was proven in my photos, as the object only appeared in 3 of my 7 photos. in the other photos there is no sign of it, but there are 100's of black & gray orbs around the area where the object was. the orbs appear in all photos. after a series of photos, i switched my camera to video mode & right then, the object just disappeared into thin air, and never came back. looking like it morphed out of this dimension. my whole  body felt very alive and amazed! i felt like the ufo gave me energy!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pear/cigar shaped ufo hovered, pulsed light or reflections, then disappeared. appeared right after a near-collision between two chemtrail planes

content.detailedDescription:
Occurred : 2/3/2007 21:00 (entered as : 02/03/07 21:00)
reported: 2/4/2007 6:26:13 am 06:26
posted: 2/24/2007
location: columbus, oh
shape: triangle
duration:3 minutes we were traveling east on broad street, east of i-270 when we saw a large black triangular shaped craft heading west very slowly toward our airport. the object had white lights around the bottom of the craft that seemed to pulsate while it moved. it also had a red "beacon" light in the middle of it that just glowed. when i saw the red light i figured that it was just a plane until it did something that conventional aircraft do not do: it hovered!!! when i saw it do that, i immediately turned my car around to get a closer look at the object. once i turned the car around to get a better look, it seemed as though the object just disappeared into the night sky. i'm not sure how many people saw this object but it caused enough of a disturbance on the ground to cause near accidents because some were trying to look at it while they were driving.

((nuforc note: witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information. pd))

i’m just adding my story, to what this person’s story above, witnessed.
occurred : 2/3/2007 21:00
location: columbus, oh
shape: diamond
lights: 2 thin white lights on each side, no beacons
color: dark matte gray or black
duration: about 10 or 20 minutes
     first let me state that i worked at the airport, on the ramp, directing planes as they landed and departed, so i’ve seen them up close and know where the beacons are located on a plane. also i live near the airport and know where the runways are located. and this (thing) had no beacons and was not headed to the runway either.
     we were traveling east on broad street, east of i-270 (in front of mount carmel east hospital), when i saw a light “which i thought was an airplane” it was southeast of broad st about a mile and a half away, heading west slowly. i kept waiting for it to head northwest and cross over broad st in the path of the airport runways, “as all the other airplanes do, that i’ve seen in the past”. as we we’re getting closer, and it was moving closer, i noticed there we’re no “beacons” where the wings should be. (or no wings at all for that matter). i kept asking my wife “what is that and when is it going to head toward the runways”. traffic was moving slow and we we’re just past the light where the mcdonald's is located on east broad st. i’m looking though the front windshield off to my right, about 25 to 30 yards. and i keep saying out loud to my wife, “what is that, that is not a plane”. as it’s moving, about 5 to 10mph, (traffic has come to a stop) it slowly started going north bound over broad st, by then it’s directly over my car, my wife was very nonchalant about it, so i said to her “would you at least acknowledge that you see this thing, so i know that i’m not the only one who see’s it”. and she nonchalantly looks up and say’s “yes i see it”. so i lower my driver side window and look up and i’m looking directly underneath this thing and it’s not making a sound (no engine sound at all-nothing) and it’s low enough, that i could have thrown a rock at it and hit it. traffic finally started moving and i’m trying to keep an eye on both, the craft and traffic, it moved slowly northwest, just west of milano’s restaurant and hovered over the field. i told my wife screw this, i have to see what this thing is, so i turned around in the bp gas station lot and headed back, but by the time i got over there, it was gone.  no traces to be found.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was moving very slow and wasn't making any noise.

content.detailedDescription: I had purchased a used car in need of repairs earlier that week. the previous owner of the car had arranged to have it towed to my house that evening so i was at the end of my driveway waiting for the tow truck. i just happened to look up at the area just above the tree line about 2500 feet away to the south west and noticed what i thought was a pair of running lights to a small plane. i watched for about a minute and realized it was not a plane when one of the pair of lights turned about 90 degrees and headed to the north west. the other continued in a straight line heading south east. it continued over the neighborhood at approximately 1000 feet up over my house moving slowly. it made no sound at all and i noticed a slight red pulsation from the center of the object. to describe it exactly i would say it was spherical, bright orange with a slight red center pulsation. at 1000 feet up i would estimate it's size to be about 20 feet across. it took at least a full minute to pass over the neighborhood disappearing over the tree line to the north east and just when i thought it was finally over i looked back at the tree line south west where i saw the first two and saw two more heading on the same path as the one that just passed over! this time they flew side by side like in formation again silently no sound at all. if i hadn't looked up i would have never even noticed them. they flew over on the same path and speed as the first and disappeared over the tree line to the north east. i have to say it was a terrifying experience. i would best describe it as belittling and you realize that you are not really at the top of the food chain after all. i will say that i was surprised that they were not being pursued by fighter jets or the military. i had the distinct feeling that there wasn't anything anyone could do about it anyway.
content.summary: Four bright orange spheres with slight red center pulsation. one changed direction; three continued over neiborhood.

content.detailedDescription: Took pictures from hilton 6th floor room on july 6, 2015 (no lights on in room when taken, and taken without flash.  noticed orb like image when we reviewed pictures when we got home.
content.summary: Didn't notice until we reviewed pictures on camera after trip

content.detailedDescription: I have a celestial telescope which i brought to my friend's house and i was setting it up for later evening viewing. we gad not been drinking. we were just getting the telescope setup and oriented for optimal viewing when we saw a usaf aircraft and its contrail. as we were taking our eyes off of the usaf aircraft a strange multicolored craft appeared in an instant as though it had uncloaked. it assumed the same flight path of the usaf aircraft (west to east) although it was much closer to ground level (approximately one mile or less). i grabbed my mobile phone to take some pictures and i was able to take three photographs. the third was taken at the moment that the craft vanished or cloaked. at that instant a white mist appeared for just a second and that mist can be seen in the third photograph. the craft made no noise whatsoever while the usaf aircraft made its usual distant engine noises. it was an exciting moment. the craft had a strange shape with no distinguishable wings. it had short extensions that were part of the craft. it did not have flight-supporting wings. it was quite real yet simultaneously surreal. it clearly appeared from nowhere. it did not gradually appear. it appeared as though it uncloaked and vanished as though returning to a cloaked state.
content.summary: We (two other witnesses) were observing a usaf aircraft (elevation approx 2 miles) when a strange craft appeared from nowhere and traveled west to east as if to observe the usaf craft. a moment later it just vanished as seen in third photograph.

content.detailedDescription: 8:15 pm went outside to smoke cig saw insteadly object in sky stationary and very visible. red flashing lites then just lites moved around hovering, change clor to green spun arpu flashing both colors then back to red, moving very slow hovering went on for 6 minutes the decendin down and disappeared .. have pics and video, attacing 1 pic.Have vidoe too
content.summary: Outside on patio about 8:15 pm saw instantly in sky could tell not plain or any normal aircraft , red with 4 lights stationary for mpments then moving and stationary again change cplors from red to green at one time and spun around with colors  .T

content.detailedDescription: I was walking a dog at about 5:34am in scottsdale az.  could not help but look up to admire the beautiful star-lit sky when i noticed one of these "stars" was moving. at first it was moving in a straight north direction...Then it stopped, reversed direction for a few seconds before turning back to head north.    it would zig-zag left to right a few times and when it did the white color would change to a reddish-orange color but that would only last a second or two. this zig-zag/color change occured about 4 times before it stopped...Stood still (totally resembling a star) and then shot off so fast straight north till it disappeared!   entire episode lasted maybe 4-5 minutes.
content.summary: Looked like a star that was moving

content.detailedDescription: On friday, july 31st , i stepped off the front porch of my home at approximately 10p.M. to see if i might catch a few early perseids in the sky. as i turned to head for the side yard from my porch i was startled by an intensely bright white light traversing the sky  in an east to west direction. as it went it would randomly slow veer slightly off any direct path, like it was a first time visitor looking around, then resume speed and course. i debunked it as no meteor as it was too big, bright, and slow for that. plus, when it would slow slightly it's brightness would lessen then return as it regained speed. when this dimming occurred multi-colored lights on top of the object would become visible until  it was father away and the angle of view changed. i estimated the altitude to be  2000-3000 feet when i first saw it and when it reached the other side of the valley, a distance of 6-7 miles it reached in less than ten seconds, it hovered around 500 ft. above the hills bordering the n.W. edge of the valley. i had called to my gf as it was traveling and she had joined me just as it reached the opposite hills and began to hover. upon doing so it's color changed to a orange-red that seemed to pulsate as it was hovering. after 20-30 seconds it began following the ridgeline of the hills it was above to the s.E., regaining the white, intense glow as it moved, its colored lights,  that weren't  visible when hovering, twinkled as before. after traveling approximately 4 mls. it stopped and hovered again and resumed the orange-red exterior for maybe ten seconds before continuing down the ridge another 4 mls. stopping to hover again. as it hovered this time it decended half-way to the hilltop below then resumed hovering for maybe ten seconds, then ascended to hover where it had been. hovering a few more seconds, it then cruised n.E. right up the center of the valley, right over mcminnville airport and disappeared behind a grove of fir trees. we were both filled with astonished exhilaration.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was on my way outside to watch the perseids when this large bright light caught my eye and  watched it for thr next four minuteswatched

content.detailedDescription: Exact location. 42 degrees,55 minutes,42seconds north,71 degrees,11 minutes,15 second west. i deliver newspapers 360 days a year from 12 to 5 am 360 days a year for the last 7.5 years, i saw red and white lights very low, so i stopped at intersection, they were not moving. i thought it might be a helicopter, but there was no sound. after about a minute it start very slowly moving close, the trees across the road where i was stopped are about 50 feet high,the object appeared to  only be up another 30 to 50 feet up..I tried to get my cell phone out of my pocket book, but pocket book was underneath newspapers unfortunately,so just kept observing and memorizing everything i could! ther were 8 to ten dashes going back each side from tip, then a blank space same size of dashes the 8 to 10  white dashes , it looked to be a perfect equilateral triangle. lights were bright like leds but not sending light down to the ground.As it came over me i heard a steady hum it was not very loud at all, i think the hum was an a or an e,  but i don't have perfect pitch.The ufo as it slowly went over. me took a slow turn toward the northeast, it stayed perfectly flat as it did this, it did not appears to bank at all, the direction it was turning was toward pease air force base.So i thought maybe it is a stealth bomber.After it started turning it went behind tree line so i continued with route took right onto sargent, then quick right onto main street caught one more quick site of it over trees to my right.I am out on the road every night, i barely ever see a plane, and when i do they are way up, can barely hear them, this was huge, guessing about length of tractor trailer truck,my last thought was, how come everyone else sees flying saucers and i see a flying triangle?When i got home i described it all in detail to my husband, then when my son got up i said guess what i saw a flying triangle, he told me to look on internet that lots of sighting of flying triangles have occurred.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangular object 8 to 10 red dashes at the point, 8 to 10 white lights going to tail

content.detailedDescription:
I was alone and up late singing songs, seated, and playing guitar in an upstairs bedroom.  i was in a looking at lyrics on sheet music and noticed for about half of a song that a glowing white orb about the size of a softball had materialized inside the house 2 feet in front of me to the right about 3 feet off the ground and it was listening to the music, not moving at all.  i kept two playing 2 more verses and moved my attention to it, as it hovered like someone standing there listening.  i wanted to touch it or see if it would move so i stopped playing.  just then it start moving about a foot a second to my left and went 12 feet across the room and right through the wall.  i ran to the window and watched it accelerate up the hill about 5 feet off the ground into the woods and out of sight.  

it was not raining or lightening.  it was not scary or threatening.  it was an observation entity gathering information/experiences and not capable of having passengers.  it seemed to have a spiritual nature in addition to the physical presence.  

two days later i was in the the small town nearby talking to other locals - and they do appear in other houses. one person described firsthand seeing one very similar to my experience, at night and mentioned that  also another family members has see them also more frequently.   i later learned these people are current and prior neighbors less than 1 mile from the house.   

talking to the prior owner of the house, on two occasions they would receive an early morning phone calls with no one speaking on the other end on days when close family members or friends would pass away.  one visitor staying at the house mentioned in the morning that they had a dream of a couple tall greys-type beings wearing some type of uniform/religious vestige, visiting them at night,  standing there just observing them, then traveling through the wall as they leave - the observer was not able to move and remained in dream type state during the visitation.   

the orb has only appeared to me the one time.
content.summary: Orb materialized inside house, listened to singing, exited by traveling through wall and up the hill

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were coming from her parents' house on our way back to our house.  she is danish.  i am american.  we live in denmark.  as we are driving along the highway, i notice a segmented rainbow.  it was a sunny day,  so i thought it was strange.  also, i have never seen just a segment of rainbow before.  i asked her to pull over so i could take a picture.  i just purchased a new cell phone and the camera on it is pretty nifty, so i wanted to test it out.
     i get out of the car and snap a few shots, then hurry back in so i wouldn't get creamed by speeding traffic. i never noticed anything when i was out there.  i just ran out of the car, took the pics and ran back in.  when i got home,  i transferred the pics to my computer so i could see them on the bigger screen. at the normal size, it looks just like a white dot.  when i zoomed in,  that's when i got sort of creeped out.  i see what look like two rows of lights going down the center of the dot.  anyway, forget about my description and see for yourself.
     i will attach the photos that i took.  there are a couple without the thing and one with the thing.  please tell me what you think.  you guys are the experts.  i just want it to be nothing, because after looking at it, it sort of scared me, but if it is something, i would also like to know.  ok, i am rambling.  check out the pics.  two without the thing and one with the thing.
content.summary: Found what appears to be ufo after looking over pictures of segmented rainbow

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i shared a second story apartment.  the kitchen was located in the back and looked out over the carports in the back.  beyond those carports were more apartment buildings.

i slept in the living room of this one bedroom apartment and could look through the kitchen door to the window.  i was sitting on my bed when i became aware that there were flashing white lights reflecting off the second story windows of the far apartments on the other side of the carports.  i realized that whatever was flashing those lights was located above the roof of my building.  there was no noise.

at first, i was going to look out the window and up, but i became afraid and instead crouched down in front of the sink and tried to hide.  in a few moments, the flashing lights were gone, and i then looked out the window.  i saw an orb of light, very large and a beautiful sea green color, just floating slowly away, rising to the tree tops and drifting out of sight.  this was in the city near the ocean.

the circle of light was contained in that it was solid and couldn't be seen through, but no light escaped it, and it appeared incandescent.  it was nothing like i have ever seen before.  it floated like a soap bubble but seemed to have a purpose and direction.  it was rather like watching a cartoon.  i didn't see anything sticking out of it. or any other flashing lights.

i yelled to my mother to look out her bedroom window, but she didn't understand and missed seeing it.  the next day, i checked all the local papers searching for mention of anything unusual, but nothing turned up.  i told a coworker the next day what i had seen, but she looked at me like i was crazy, and didn't ask any questions about it.

i have remembered this for all these years, as i feel now, being older, i should have looked fully out the window, but at the time i was really afraid.  i really think i saw a ufo that night.  i remember being absolutely amazed as i watched it leave, but while it was over the roof, i was terrified.

i'll be honest, i was having an argument with my mother, and i have always felt that somehow i attracted the darn thing.  right or wrong, i felt like it had been listening.  when we stopped because i began to watch out the window, it left.  needless to say, i showed much more respect to my mother after that!
content.summary: Unknown craft hovered over apartment building
